text:
Hi! Sorry for some reason I didn’t receive notifications for the message you sent, hence the late reply! So of course I heard about Blue Zoo! I wanted to apply for an internship you guys had back in May but I chickened out :sweat_smile:
So I graduated last year with a BA in 3D design and animation and honestly have been stuck for a while. I enjoy character art the most of the whole pipeline, but I know it’s highly unlikely to get hired for that position as a junior :(  I’ve been working retail jobs throughout uni, now I’m a supervisor in a coffee shop and trying to to work on my portfolio in the meantime.
I think what I would gain the most from us feedback for sure and maybe some extra motivation :joy:
